title: Activity-Based Introduction to Nutrigenomics: Personalized Nutrition and Gene Expression Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing experiments using digital tools and developing data interpretation skills.

learning_goals: Learners can generate three meaningful research questions using core concepts of nutrigenomics.
Learners can simulate the design of experiments on fatty acids affecting liver gene expression using provided digital tools.
Learners can conduct feasibility evaluations considering genetic variables when establishing personalized dietary plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
